ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure

Class StructureSnake

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure.StructureSnake
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    big.ij.snake2D.Snake2D
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WPouchStructureSnake

    public abstract class StructureSnake
extends java.lang.Object
implements big.ij.snake2D.Snake2D
    Abstract class to extend for descrbing a morphological structure using B-splines.

    B-splines are used to obtain a parameterized description of a morphological structure such as the Drosophila wing pouch or embryo. Look at the implementation of WPouchStructureSnake for an idea of how to extend this class.

    Version:
    November 9, 2011
    Author:
    Thomas Schaffter (thomas.schaff...@gmail.com), Ricard Delgado-Gonzalo (ricard.delg...@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Structure, WPouchStructureSnake

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int AGGREGATION_MEAN
      Mean aggregated structure.
      static int AGGREGATION_MEAN_MINUS_STD
      Mean-std aggregated structure (only structure contour is affected, boundaries are still obtained by the mean method).
      static int AGGREGATION_MEAN_PLUS_STD
      Mean+std aggregated structure (only structure contour is affected, boundaries are still obtained by the mean method).

      • getAnchorPointOnContour

        public abstract big.ij.snake2D.Snake2DNode getAnchorPointOnContour(int axis)
                                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves the point on the exterior contour where the an axis attaches.

        These points correspond to {D,V,A,P}. Note that there is no systematic correspondence between the value of the parameter axis and any of the points {D,V,A,P}.

        Parameters:
        axis - Takes values in [0,3].
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getExteriorArchCoordinates

        public abstract java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double[] getExteriorArchCoordinates(int axis)
                                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves a list of points containing the coordinates of the exterior outline.

        Note that there is no systematic correspondence between the value of the parameter axis and the order of the output points.

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • isCanceledByUser

        public boolean isCanceledByUser()
        If true, indicates that the user chose to interactively abort the processing of the snake.

        Otherwise, if false, indicates that the dealings with the snake were terminated without user assistance.
